paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.phenotype: mixed phenotype with variable ages at onset and rate of progression

functional_data.summary: The clinical phenotype encompassed: bilateral carpal tunnel syndrome; sensory, motor, and autonomic neuropathy; restrictive cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and family segregation.
variants.additional_notes: Glu89Gln is the most common mutation in Bulgaria.
key_quotes: All of these affected displayed a mixed phenotype with variable ages at onset and rate of progression, according to their mutation.
Glu89Gln was found to be the most frequent TTR mutation in Bulgaria (78.53%).

patients.phenotype: late-onset disease with axonal sensory-motor and autonomic polyneuropathy.

functional_data.summary: Clinical phenotype was of a late-onset disease with a mean age at the onset of 65.57 years.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: The clinical phenotype was considered milder compared to other mutations.
key_quotes: The clinical phenotype was of a late-onset disease with a mean age at the onset of 65.57 years.

patients.phenotype: late-onset form with axonal sensory-motor and autonomic polyneuropathy.

functional_data.summary: Clinical phenotype is of a late-onset form with a mean age at onset 57.60 years.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: The clinical phenotype was considered similar to Glu89Gln.
key_quotes: The clinical phenotype is of a late-onset form with a mean age at onset 57.60 years.

patients.phenotype: early-onset disease with severe gastrointestinal manifestations.

functional_data.summary: The clinical phenotype encompassed early and severe gastrointestinal manifestations.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: The clinical course was rapidly progressive.
key_quotes: The clinical phenotype encompassed early and severe gastrointestinal manifestations.

patients.phenotype: mixed phenotype with neuropathic and cardiac involvement.

functional_data.summary: The clinical phenotype at diagnosis was mixed, most often neuropathic and cardiac.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical presentation.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had a family history of the same disease.
key_quotes: The clinical phenotype at diagnosis was mixed, most often neuropathic and cardiac.

tables_processed.table_caption: Epidemiological data of Bulgarian hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis (ATTRv) patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and tables.
